title: How to say 'Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility' in Russian - Quora

response.answer_text: Freedom from what,? What makes you think that Russian people feel that they are without it? I am here now. The shops are full. Clothes and groceries. They drive Europe and Russian cars. My friends all happy. So what is freedom,? I

Большинству людей в действительности не нужна свобода, потому что она означает ответственность. If you want a fancy form, substitute the “потому что” with “ибо”. The general meaning will remain just the same.
